alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 11 at 6:33PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Citrus, west central Sumter, western Pasco and Hernando Counties through 715 PM EST... At 632 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weeki Wachee, or over Spring Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Brooksville, Inverness, Hudson, Weeki Wachee, New Port Richey East, Inverness Airport, Hill n Dale, South Brooksville, North Brooksville, Jasmine Estates, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Pine Island, Hernando County Airport, North Weeki Wachee, Timber Pines and Beacon Square. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco; Sumter
